document_title: Summer Bloom Alert - Southern German Lakes 2022
content_text: Early warning system alert for potential algal blooms in southern German lakes based on current monitoring data and predictive models.
author: Dr. Thomas Meyer

source_name: DLR - Deutsches Zentrum für Luft- und Raumfahrt
document_title: Satellite Monitoring of German Water Bodies 2022
content_text: Technical report on the use of satellite data for monitoring water quality in German lakes. Includes validation results and accuracy assessments.
author: Dr. Petra Wagner
